_comment: Created by ianb on 14/10/2013 11:42:04 using v0.9
title: How has the proportion of social care users who feel safe changed by age?
analysis_commentary: In both 2011/12 and 2012/13 a higher proportion of adults 65 and over who use social care services felt as safe as they wanted to compared to adults aged 18-64 years. The differences between age groups were 5.0% in 2011/12 and a difference of 5.7% in 2012/13.
data_source: Health & Social Care Information Centre, Personal Adult Social Care Survey
